SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.iver.cit.gvsig
Class ProjectExtension

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.andami.plugins.Extension
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.ProjectExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtension, IExtensionStatus
public class ProjectExtension
extends Extension
implements IExtensionStatus

Extension que proporciona controles para crear proyectos nuevos, abrirlos y guardarlos. Además los tipos de tabla que soporta el proyecto son añadidos en esta clase.

Author:
Fernando González Cortés, Pablo Piqueras Bartolomé (pablo.piqueras@iver.es)

Nested Class Summary
 class ProjectExtension.UnsavedProject
          Implements the IUnsavedData interface to show unsaved projects in the Unsavad Data dialog.

Constant Field Values

PROJECTENCODING

public static java.lang.String PROJECTENCODING
Use UTF-8 for encoding, as it can represent characters from any language. Another sensible option would be encoding = System.getProperty("file.encoding"); but this would need some extra testing.

readProject

public Project readProject(java.lang.String path)

readProject

public Project readProject(java.io.File file)
Lee del XML el proyecto.

Reads the XML of the project.
It returns a project object holding all needed info that is not linked to the Project Dialog.
In case you want the project to be linked to the window you must set this object to the extension:
Example:
...
...
Project p = ProjectExtension.readProject(projectFile);
ProjectExtension.setProject(p); ...
...

Parameters:
file - Fichero.
Returns:
Project

readProject

public Project readProject(java.io.Reader reader,
                           boolean encodingFollowed)
                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Lee del XML el proyecto.

Reads the XML of the project.
It returns a project object holding all needed info that is not linked to the Project Dialog.
In case you want the project to be linked to the window you must set this object to the extension:
Example:
...
...
Project p = ProjectExtension.readProject(projectFile);
ProjectExtension.setProject(p); ...
...

Parameters:
reader - File reader
encodingFollowed - Whether the encoded specified in the xml header was followed when creating the reader. If the property followHeaderEncoding is false or not set, then the encoding should have not been used when creating the reader, so it must be recreated.
Returns:
Project
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

public Project getProject()
Devuelve el proyecto.

Returns:
Proyecto.

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled()
Description copied from interface: IExtension
This method is invoked by Andami to check whether the extension (and its associated controls) is enabled or disabled. Disabled controls (menus and buttons) are shown in light grey colour, and it is not possible to click on them.

Specified by:
isEnabled in interface IExtension
Returns:
true if the extension should be enabled, false otherwise
See Also:
IExtension.isEnabled()

hasUnsavedData

public boolean hasUnsavedData()
Description copied from interface: IExtensionStatus
This method is used to check if the extension has some unsaved data. For example, if the project has been modified, or there is a layer in edition mode.

Specified by:
hasUnsavedData in interface IExtensionStatus
Returns:
true if the extension has some unsaved data, false otherwise.

getUnsavedData

public IUnsavedData[] getUnsavedData()
Description copied from interface: IExtensionStatus

Gets an array of the UnsavedData objects, which contain information about the unsaved data and allows to save it.

Specified by:
getUnsavedData in interface IExtensionStatus
Returns:
An array of the associated unsaved data, or null in case the extension has not unsaved data.

getRunningProcesses

public com.iver.utiles.swing.threads.IMonitorableTask[] getRunningProcesses()
Description copied from interface: IExtensionStatus

Gets an array of the traceable background tasks associated with this extension. These tasks may be tracked, canceled, etc.

Specified by:
getRunningProcesses in interface IExtensionStatus
Returns:
An array of the associated background tasks, or null in case there is no associated background tasks.

hasRunningProcesses

public boolean hasRunningProcesses()
Description copied from interface: IExtensionStatus
This method is used to check if the extension has some associated background process which is currently running.

Specified by:
hasRunningProcesses in interface IExtensionStatus
Returns:
true if the extension has some associated background process, false otherwise.

addListener

public void addListener(com.iver.utiles.save.BeforeSavingListener l)
Adds the specified before saving listener to receive "before saving file events" from this component. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

Parameters:
l - the before saving listener.
See Also:
SaveEvent, BeforeSavingListener, removeListener(BeforeSavingListener), getBeforeSavingListeners()

addListener

public void addListener(com.iver.utiles.save.AfterSavingListener l)
Adds the specified after saving listener to receive "after saving file events" from this component. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

Parameters:
l - the after saving listener.
See Also:
SaveEvent, AfterSavingListener, removeListener(AfterSavingListener), getAfterSavingListeners()

getBeforeSavingListeners

public com.iver.utiles.save.BeforeSavingListener[] getBeforeSavingListeners()
Returns an array of all the before saving listeners registered on this component.

Returns:
all of this component's BeforeSavingListeners or an empty array if no key listeners are currently registered
See Also:
#addBeforeSavingListener(BeforeSavingListener), #removeBeforeSavingListener(BeforeSavingListener)

getAfterSavingListeners

public com.iver.utiles.save.AfterSavingListener[] getAfterSavingListeners()
Returns an array of all the after saving listeners registered on this component.

Returns:
all of this component's AfterSavingListeners or an empty array if no key listeners are currently registered
See Also:
#addAfterSavingListener(AfterSavingListener), #removeAfterSavingListener

removeListener

public void removeListener(com.iver.utiles.save.BeforeSavingListener l)
Removes the specified before saving listener so that it no longer receives save file events from this component. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this component. If listener l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

Parameters:
l - the before saving listener
See Also:
SaveEvent, BeforeSavingListener, addListener(BeforeSavingListener), getBeforeSavingListeners()

removeListener

public void removeListener(com.iver.utiles.save.AfterSavingListener l)
Removes the specified after saving listener so that it no longer receives save file events from this component. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this component. If listener l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

Parameters:
l - the after saving listener
See Also:
SaveEvent, AfterSavingListener, addListener(AfterSavingListener), getAfterSavingListeners()
